00.orig_text: Australian government announces $52.5 million financial assistance package for Ford
00.text: Australian government announces $52.5 million financial assistance package for Ford

02.orig_text: Australian Prime Minister John Howard and federal industry minister Ian MacDonald today announced that the federal government would be providing Ford Australia with a AU$52.5 million (US$40.4 million) ``financial assistance package``.
02.text: Australian Prime Minister John Howard and federal industry minister Ian MacDonald today announced that the federal government would be providing Ford Australia with a AU$52.5 million (US$40.4 million) ``financial assistance package``.

03.orig_text: Additional assistance will also be provided by the Victorian state government.
03.text: Additional assistance will also be provided by the Victorian state government.

04.orig_text: According to Mr Howard, the injection will secure Ford's manufacturing operations in Australia ``for the long term``.
04.text: According to Mr Howard, the injection will secure Ford's manufacturing operations in Australia ``for the long term``.

05.orig_text: From the package, AU$40 million will be used for the design and manufacture of Ford's next model Falcon and Territory vehicles, which will be built in Australia.
05.text: From the package, AU$40 million will be used for the design and manufacture of Ford's next model Falcon and Territory vehicles, which will be built in Australia.

06.orig_text: Despite being given a major facelift in 2002 and another in 2005, the Falcon's bodyshell dates back to 1998.
06.text: Despite being given a major facelift in 2002 and another in 2005, the Falcon's bodyshell dates back to 1998.

07.orig_text: The current Falcon will need to serve the company until at least 2007 when the new model is anticipated.
07.text: The current Falcon will need to serve the company until at least 2007 when the new model is anticipated.

08.orig_text: In the meantime, it will face stiff competition from the completely new Holden Commodore (the Falcon's major competitor) which will be released in the second half of this year.
08.text: In the meantime, it will face stiff competition from the completely new Holden Commodore (the Falcon's major competitor) which will be released in the second half of this year.

09.orig_text: The additional AU$12.5 million will be spent on the development of a light commercial vehicle platform, which will be built overseas and marketed to around 80 countries.
09.text: The additional AU$12.5 million will be spent on the development of a light commercial vehicle platform, which will be built overseas and marketed to around 80 countries.

10.orig_text: Mr Howard said that the light commercial project would involve construction of a research and development centre, which will become the base for R&D projects in the region.
10.text: Mr Howard said that the light commercial project would involve construction of a research and development centre, which will become the base for R&D projects in the region.

11.orig_text: Mr MacFarlane said that the research facility was exciting for Australia and that it would put the Australian automotive in the spotlight.
11.text: Mr MacFarlane said that the research facility was exciting for Australia and that it would put the Australian automotive in the spotlight.

12.orig_text: ``The funding has helped Ford Australia secure the largest automotive R&D project ever undertaken in Australia which is equally exciting news for local Ford employees and Australian component producers`` he said.
12.text: ``The funding has helped Ford Australia secure the largest automotive R&D project ever undertaken in Australia which is equally exciting news for local Ford employees and Australian component producers`` he said.

13.orig_text: ``The project will see Ford Australia become a centre for automotive design and engineering excellence in the Asia Pacific region which will bring spin-off benefits for the broader industry,`` ``This opportunity will put both Ford Australia, and the Australian automotive and components sectors on the world map as far as our automotive design and engineering capabilities are concerned.``
13.text: ``The project will see Ford Australia become a centre for automotive design and engineering excellence in the Asia Pacific region which will bring spin-off benefits for the broader industry,`` ``This opportunity will put both Ford Australia, and the Australian automotive and components sectors on the world map as far as our automotive design and engineering capabilities are concerned.``

15.orig_text: Mr Howard claims that the projects will create 273 jobs and secure the future of the ``iconic`` Ford Falcon, which has been built in Australia since 1960.
15.text: Mr Howard claims that the projects will create 273 jobs and secure the future of the ``iconic`` Ford Falcon, which has been built in Australia since 1960.

16.orig_text: The financial package is conditional upon Ford Australia giving the Australian automotive component industry an opportunity to supply components for the vehicles produced by the two projects.
16.text: The financial package is conditional upon Ford Australia giving the Australian automotive component industry an opportunity to supply components for the vehicles produced by the two projects.
